metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8796 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Out-Of-Bounds Read in function process_bitmap_updates() that results in a Denial of Service (segfault).

criterions.comment: rdesktop: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
